title: Trump is calling for Intel's CEO to step down. Here's why.
shortDescription: The president posted on social media Aug. 7 that Intel's chief "must resign, immediately," sending stocks tumbling. Here's what to know.

title: Trump's political war in Texas is bigger than the Lone Star State
shortDescription: Spurred on by Trump, Texas Republicans redrew the boundary lines for U.S. House seats in the state. The new map creates five more GOP-leaning seats.

title: GOP senator says FBI will help track down Texas Dems who fled state
shortDescription: Sen. John Cornyn said FBI Director Kash Patel will have federal officers work with Texas state law enforcement to locate Democrats who fled the state.

title: Tim Cook gifts Trump a custom Apple plaque with 24-karat gold base
shortDescription: President Trump hosted Apple CEO Tim Cook at the White House as they announced new US investments. Cook also gifted Trump a plaque with gold base.

title: Trump & Putin: A closer look at their complex time together
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin's relationship has evolved around shifting geopolitical dynamics. See their interactions.

title: Trump orders colleges to hand over more race-related admissions data
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will sign a memorandum ordering colleges to be more transparent about their admissions data.

title: Trump to honor 100 Purple Heart recipients at White House ceremony
shortDescription: President Trump is honoring nearly 100 Purple Heart recipients injured in military action, including some veterans who gave their badges to Trump.

title: Trump to sign order opening way for alternative assets in 401(k)s,
shortDescription: The president is scheduled to sign executive orders at 12:00 ET, according to a White House public schedule.

title: Trump demands new U.S. Census — says non-citizens won't be counted
shortDescription: President Donald Trump demanded a new count of American households based on his 2024 election victory. He said non-citizens would not be included.

title: Pro-Trump group wages campaign to purge 'subversive' federal workers
shortDescription: The American Accountability Foundation wants 175 federal employees removed from their jobs for allegedly promoting liberal ideologies.

title: Bibles. Prayer. Faith. What Trump's new memo on religion means
shortDescription: Trump's administration previously touted guidance Clinton's administration issued in 1997 on federal employees' right to religious expression at work.

title: Brazil's president sees no point in tariff talks with Trump
shortDescription: Brazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva told Reuters in an interview that he saw no room for direct talks with President Donald Trump.

title: Trump’s new tariffs take effect, targeting dozens of trading partners
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's higher tariff rates of 10% to 50% on dozens of trading partners kicked in on Aug. 7.

title: Trump plans talks with Putin, Zelenskyy
shortDescription: President Donald Trump could meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy ahead of an Aug. 8 war deadline.

title: Apple CEO gives Trump 24K gold gift
shortDescription: Apple CEO Tim Cook presented President Donald Trump a 24K gold gift as Apple pledges $600B in U.S. manufacturing.

title: Trump to impose 100% tariffs on semiconductors and computer chips
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said companies committed to building in the United States would be spared from the tariffs.

title: Trump reacts to Fort Stewart shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump offered prayers to the victims involved in a shooting at Fort Stewart in Georgia, saying the shooter will be prosecuted fully.

title: Trump's approval rating dips in new poll: What recent surveys show
shortDescription: A survey released this week finds a dip in support for President Trump in one of his key bases. It's the latest in a string of low approval numbers.

title: DOGE 'Big Balls' assault fuels Trump's DC plan
shortDescription: Officers observed a group of about 10 youths surrounding Edward Coristine's car and assaulting him, a police report says.

title: Trump could meet Putin as early as next week, reports say
shortDescription: On July 28, Trump announced that he would be giving Russia 10 to 12 days to end its three-year war on Ukraine or face "stiff tariffs."

title: Texas Democrats evacuated from hotel in Illinois over bomb threat
shortDescription: Some of the Texas Democrats who fled their state to try to block GOP redistricting efforts were evacuated from an Illinois hotel over a bomb threat.

title: UCLA has $584M frozen by Trump admin over 2024 protests
shortDescription: "If these funds remain suspended, it will be devastating for UCLA and for Americans across the nation," UCLA Chancellor Julio Frenk said.

title: Trump administration restricts junk food purchases through SNAP
shortDescription: HHS Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. announced the expansion of a Trump administration effort to limit the purchase of junk food using SNAP benefits, part of what officials are calling a broader initiative to “Make America Healthy Again.”
